name: The puzzle of blocks
description:
Including: Millions of different difficulty block puzzle competitions.

You can save every game, challenge yourself or share it with your friends.

You can also watch others' games, challenge and surpass them.

You will find joy in every challenge.

If you don't like challenges, you can play this game as an elimination game.

You can define hundreds of favorite blocks yourself, whether they are new or old.

This game won't encounter repeated matches, it can always be with you.
